abstract: NHL Roundup; Tampa Bay Lightning defeats Buffalo Sabres, 2-1; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Tampa Bay beat Buffalo, 2-1, as Lightning goalie Ben Bishop won his 84th game, breaking a tie with Nikolai Khabibulin.

headline.main: Goalie Sets Lightning Record With Victory Over the Sabres
headline.print_headline: Goalie Sets Lightning Record With Victory Over the Sabres

snippet: Tampa Bay beat Buffalo, 2-1, as Lightning goalie Ben Bishop won his 84th game, breaking a tie with Nikolai Khabibulin.
